quests.textToSpeak: I can't believe this is finally happening!
I really don't care anymore.
Oh no, not again...
This is the best day of my life!
I just found out I lost the job.
I'm so nervous about tomorrow's presentation.
Wow, I never expected this surprise!
I wish I hadn't said that to her.
Finally, some peace and quiet.
